text:
It‚Äôs never been a good bet to bet against America. 

And it still isn‚Äôt. 
 #JointAddress

text: We have stared into an abyss of insurrection and autocracy ‚Äî of pandemic and pain ‚Äî and ‚ÄúWe the People‚Äù did not flinch.  #JointAddress
label: D

text:
And if we do, then we will meet the central challenge of the age by proving that democracy is durable and strong. 

The autocrats will not win the future. 

America will.  #JointAddress
label: D

text: We‚Äôre vaccinating the nation. We‚Äôre creating hundreds of thousands of jobs. We‚Äôre delivering real results people can see and feel in their own lives.   #JointAddress
label: D

text: Can our democracy deliver on its promise that all of us ‚Äì created equal in the image of God ‚Äì have a chance to lead lives of dignity, respect, and possibility?  #JointAddress
label: D

text:
And if we are to truly restore the soul of America ‚Äì we need to protect the sacred right to vote. 

More people voted in the last presidential election than ever before  
in our history ‚Äì in the middle of one of the worst pandemics ever.  
 #JointAddress
label: D

text: Immigrants have done so much for America during the pandemic ‚Äì as they have throughout our history.  #JointAddress
label: D

text:
Talk to most responsible gun owners, most hunters ‚Äì they‚Äôll tell you there‚Äôs no possible justification for having 100 rounds ‚Äì 100 bullets ‚Äì in a weapon. 
 #JointAddress
label: D

text:
In the 1990s, we passed universal background checks and a ban on assault weapons and high‚Äîcapacity magazines that hold 100 rounds that can be fired in seconds. 

We beat the NRA. Mass shootings and gun violence declined. 
 #JointAddress
label: D

text:
And I need not tell anyone this, but gun violence is an epidemic in America.  
#JointAddress
label: D

text:
Let‚Äôs reauthorize the Violence Against Women Act, which has been law in this country for 27 years since I first wrote it. 

It will close the so‚Äîcalled ‚Äúboyfriend‚Äù loophole to keep guns out of the hands of abusers. 
#JointAddress
label: D

text:
Most men and women in uniform wear their badge and serve their communities honorably. 

I know them. I know they want to help meet this moment as well.  #JointAddress
label: D

text:
And my fellow Americans, we must come together to heal the soul of this nation.  
#JointAddress
label: D

text:
We went to Afghanistan to get the terrorists who attacked us on 9/11.  

We delivered justice to Osama Bin Laden and we degraded the terrorist threat of al Qaeda in Afghanistan. 

After 20 years of American valor and sacrifice, it‚Äôs time to bring our troops home. 
#JointAddress
label: D

text:
America is an idea ‚Äì unique in the world. 

We are all created equal. It‚Äôs who we are. We cannot walk away from that principle. 
 #JointAddress
label: D

text: America will stand up to unfair trade practices that undercut American workers and industries, like subsidies for state-owned enterprises and the theft of American technologies and intellectual property.  #JointAddress
label: D

text:
The investments I‚Äôve proposed tonight also advance a foreign policy that benefits the middle class. 

That means making sure every nation plays by the same rules in the global economy, including China.  #JointAddress
label: D

text:
That‚Äôs why ‚Äì I kept my commitment to rejoin the Paris Climate Agreement on my first day in office.  

And I kept my commitment to convene a climate summit right here in America, with all of the major economies of the world ‚Äì
label: D

text: There‚Äôs no wall high enough to keep any virus away.   #JointAddress
label: D

text:
My fellow Americans, we have to show not just that we are back, but that we are here to stay. 

And that we aren‚Äôt going it alone ‚Äì we‚Äôre going to be leading with our allies.  #JointAddress
label: D

text:
My fellow Americans, trickle-down economics has  
never worked. 

It‚Äôs time to grow the economy from the bottom up and middle-out.  #JointAddress
label: D

text: It raises the revenue to pay for the plans I‚Äôve proposed that will create millions of jobs and grow the economy. #JointAddress
label: D

text:
But I will not add to the tax burden of the middle class of this country.  

They‚Äôre already paying enough. 

What I‚Äôve proposed is fair. It‚Äôs fiscally responsible.   #JointAddress
label: D

text:
We‚Äôre going to get rid of the loopholes that allow Americans who make more than $1 million a year pay a lower rate on their capital gains than working Americans pay on their work.  

This will only affect three tenths of 1% of all Americans.  #JointAddress
label: D

text: And, we‚Äôre going to reward work, not wealth.   #JointAddress
label: D

text:
A lot of companies evade taxes through tax havens from Switzerland to Bermuda to the Cayman Islands. 

And they benefit from tax loopholes and deductions that allow for offshoring jobs and shifting profits overseas.  #JointAddress
label: D

text:
A recent study shows that 55 of the nation‚Äôs biggest corporations paid zero in federal income tax last year. 

No federal taxes on more than $40 billion in profits.  #JointAddress
label: D

text:
It‚Äôs time for corporate America and the wealthiest 1% of Americans to pay their fair share. 

Just pay their fair share. 
 #JointAddress
label: D

text:
Let‚Äôs start with what I will not do. 

I will not impose any tax increases on people making less than $400,000 a year.  
 #JointAddress
label: D

text:
Let‚Äôs give Medicare the power to save hundreds of billions of dollars by negotiating lower prices for prescription drugs.  

That won‚Äôt just help people on Medicare ‚Äì it will lower prescription drug costs for everyone.   #JointAddress
label: D

text: The Affordable Care Act has been a lifeline for millions of Americans ‚Äìprotecting people with pre-existing conditions, protecting women‚Äôs health.   #JointAddress
label: D

text:
In March we expanded a tax credit for every child in a family. 

Up to a $3,000 Child Tax Credit for children over 6 ‚Äî and $3,600 for children under 6.  

With two parents, two kids, that‚Äôs up to $7,200 in your pocket to help take care of your family.  #JointAddress
label: D

text:
Third, the American Families Plan will finally provide up to 12 weeks of paid family and medical leave. 

No one should have to choose between a job and paycheck or taking care of themselves and a loved one ‚Äì a parent, spouse, or child.  #JointAddress
label: D

text: But, the rest of the world isn‚Äôt waiting for us. Doing nothing is not an option.  #JointAddress
label: D

text: ‚ÄúWall Street didn‚Äôt build this country. The middle class built this country. And unions built the middle class.‚Äù #JointAddress
label: D

text: ‚ÄúThe Americans Jobs Plan is a blue-collar blueprint to build America.‚Äù #JointAddress
label: D

text: Nearly 90% of the infrastructure jobs created in the American Jobs Plan don‚Äôt require a college degree. 75% don‚Äôt require an associate‚Äôs degree. #JointAddress
label: D

text: Independent experts estimate the American Jobs Plan will add millions of jobs and trillions of dollars in economic growth for years to come. These are good-paying jobs that can‚Äôt be outsourced.  #JointAddress
label: D

text: And all the investments in American jobs right now--we got them all on one principle #BuyAmerican  #JointAddress
label: D

text:
American jobs plan will help millions of people get back to their jobs and back to their careers
#JointAddress
label: D

text: Public investment in infrastructure has literally transformed America. Our attitudes as well as our opportunities.   #JointAddress

text: More jobs in the first 100 days than any President on record. #JointAddress

text: We're on track to cut childhood poverty in half this year. #JointAddress

text: We‚Äôre vaccinating the nation. We‚Äôre creating hundreds of thousands of jobs. We‚Äôre delivering real results people can see and feel in their own lives. Opening the doors of opportunity. Guaranteeing fairness and justice. #JointAddress
label: D

text:
We're working, again.
Dreaming again.
Discovering again.
And, leading the world again.
#JointAddress
